title: AI-Guided Knowledge Discovery - Map of Everything Framework

extraction.notes: Major pedagogical framework development - Map of Everything

core_concepts.name: Map of Everything (MOE)
core_concepts.description: Using AI to navigate knowledge space between known points - like a fractal Dewey Decimal System

core_concepts.name: Seeing in the Dark
core_concepts.description: Using AI to illuminate unknown knowledge spaces between two known concepts
core_concepts.quote: we can see in the dark by navigating using ai to places we don't know how to go to

core_concepts.name: Fractal Dewey Decimal System
core_concepts.description: Infinitely deep and infinitely expanding knowledge organization - can zoom between any two numbers infinitely
core_concepts.quote: It's like a Map of Everything - a fractal dewey to the last text character on a page

core_concepts.name: MicroPHD
core_concepts.description: Personal unique knowledge contributions - new thoughts that qualify as new knowledge
core_concepts.quote: today I think microPHD is a new thought that I thought that I'm not sure anyone else has ever thought

core_concepts.name: Question Only You Can Answer
core_concepts.description: Guiding question for learners to discover their unique contribution
core_concepts.quote: what is a question only you can answer

step_1.name: Navigate into darkness
step_1.description: Use AI to explore unknown space between two known knowledge points

step_2.name: Bring into light
step_2.description: Narrow and specify through selection, answering questions, dialogue with AI

step_3.name: Make new knowledge
step_3.description: Create thinking tools - journal entries, workplans, workbooks - that contribute NEW knowledge not already in the map

philosophical_influences.concept: All knowledge within us, need to navigate to find it
philosophical_influences.application: Knowledge discovery through dialogue and questioning
Using AI to shine light on past thinkers' potential views on modern concepts
Knowledge map constantly rebuilt yet fundamentally same - Theseus 2, Theseus 3 with each iteration
Framework for organizing all knowledge with infinite depth between categories

pedagogical_principles.quote: AI engine simply waits for people to talk to it and so it needs good prompting and people don't always prompt well. They prompt for answers not questions

pedagogical_principles.description: Learner navigates with curiosity, AI illuminates and expands options
Create panels of experts who disagree to critique ideas and stimulate thinking
pedagogical_principles.quote: I asked to create a diverse panel of pedagalogical experts who disagree with eachother
I want people to think their own thoughts and make knowledge theirs, to internalize it

pedagogical_principles.description: Explore existing map, then add your own unique coordinates/knowledge

projects_context.likely_project: Bloom education work or new learning platform
projects_context.purpose: Help people learn things they don't know they need to learn
projects_context.stage: Framework development, seeking to simplify for broader audience

intellectual_style: Metaphorical thinker - uses vivid metaphors (seeing in dark, map navigation, fractal depth)
Innovation-focused - actively seeking 'new knowledge' and 'questions only you can answer'
Philosophical grounding - references Socrates, Ship of Theseus

teaching_philosophy.core_belief: Knowledge is infinite and explorable, learners can contribute uniquely
teaching_philosophy.goal: Enable learners to discover AND create knowledge

self_awareness.quote: today I think microPHD is a new thought that I thought that I'm not sure anyone else has ever thought
self_awareness.notes: Actively aware of his own knowledge creation process

linguistic_patterns.writing_style: Fast-paced, stream of consciousness when explaining ideas, many parenthetical additions
linguistic_patterns.communication_goal: Trying to simplify complex framework for high school audience

values_visible.evidence: Framework designed to help people discover their own unique questions and contributions
Making complex knowledge navigation accessible via conversational AI
Emphasis on questions over answers, dialogue over transmission

innovation_assessment.novelty: High - combining AI capabilities with Socratic method and fractal knowledge organization
innovation_assessment.potential_impact: Significant - could transform how students navigate and contribute to knowledge
innovation_assessment.stage: Early conceptual development, seeking to communicate clearly
